item.title: President Mohammad Shahabuddin reaches Pabna on two-day visit
item.description: President Mohammad Shahabuddin reached his home district of Pabna on Saturday morning for a two-day official visit. The President landed at Pabna Stadium by helicopter at 9:40 am, where he was received by Deputy Commissioner Mohammad Mofizul Islam and Pabna Police Superintendent Mortoza Ali Khan.
